ClassDecl.Name: CommonScrollStyle
ClassDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>A general implementation for <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::GuiScroll::IStyleController@s:vl.presentation.controls.GuiScroll" /></links> to make a scroll control.</summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: CreateDecreaseButtonStyle
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Callback to create a style controller for the decrement button.</summary> <returns>The created style controller.</returns> <param name="direction">The direction of the scroll.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: CreateIncreaseButtonStyle
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Callback to create a style controller for the increment button.</summary> <returns>The created style controller.</returns> <param name="direction">The direction of the scroll.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: CreateHandleButtonStyle
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Callback to create a style controller for the handle button.</summary> <returns>The created style controller.</returns> <param name="direction">The direction of the scroll.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: InstallBackground
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Install necessary compositions and elements to the background.</summary> <returns>The created container composition.</returns> <param name="boundsComposition">The background composition.</param> <param name="direction">The direction of the scroll.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: BuildStyle
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Build the style. This function is supposed to be called in the contructor of the sub class.</summary> <param name="defaultSize">The size of the increment button and decrement button.</param> <param name="arrowSize">The size of the arrows in the increment button and decrement button.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: CommonScrollStyle
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Create the style controller using a specified direction.</summary> <param name="_direction">The specified direction</param> </Document>
